alert.note: Alert for Langlade; Menominee; Northern Marinette County; Northern Oconto County; Shawano; Southern Marinette County; Southern Oconto County (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 12 at 4:50PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...Scattered strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Marinette, Menominee, Oconto, southeastern Langlade and central Shawano Counties through 615 PM CDT... At 449 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking scattered strong thunderstorms moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Marinette, Shawano, Menominee, Oconto, Gillett, Crivitz, Mountain, Wausaukee, Pound and White Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will relay your report to the National Weather Service office in Green Bay. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM CDT for north central and northeastern Wisconsin.

area.areaDesc: Langlade; Menominee; Northern Marinette County; Northern Oconto County; Shawano; Southern Marinette County; Southern Oconto County
